system.description: At 3rd level, you gain proficiency in a skill associated with your elemental affinity, or an expertise die in that skill if you are already proficient. When you gain the Expand Element, Improved Expand Element, and Greater Expand Element features at 5th, 11th, and 17th level in this class, you gain this feature again with reference to the elemental affinity you added or improved at that level.
